Set Variables to Use in GEE Model

Source: R/fit_gee.R
vars_gee.Rd

Set Variables to Use in GEE Model

Usage

vars_gee(
  response = "AVAL",
  covariates = c(),
  id = "USUBJID",
  arm = "ARM",
  visit = "AVISIT"
)

Arguments

response

(character)
name of response variable.

covariates

(character)
vector of names of variables to use as covariates.

id

(character)
name of variable to use to identify unique IDs.

arm

(character)
name of arm variable.

visit

(character)
name of visit variable.

Value

A list of variables that can be used as the vars argument in fit_gee().

Examples

vars_gee()
#> $response
#> [1] "AVAL"
#> 
#> $covariates
#> NULL
#> 
#> $id
#> [1] "USUBJID"
#> 
#> $arm
#> [1] "ARM"
#> 
#> $visit
#> [1] "AVISIT"
#> 

vars_gee(
  response = "CHG",
  covariates = c("SEX", "RACE"),
  id = "SUBJID",
  arm = "ARMCD",
  visit = "AVISITN"
)
#> $response
#> [1] "CHG"
#> 
#> $covariates
#> [1] "SEX"  "RACE"
#> 
#> $id
#> [1] "SUBJID"
#> 
#> $arm
#> [1] "ARMCD"
#> 
#> $visit
#> [1] "AVISITN"
#>
